translation.en: - I got a sugar cube. - I got a biscuit crumb.
translation.es: - Azúcar. - Yo, una miga de galleta.

translation.en: On the next sneak, can we break into the house with the… What's that?
translation.es: - La próxima vez, ¿entramos a la casa…? - ¿Qué es eso?

translation.en: Funny- looking. Can we eat it? No! It's a…
Well, it's a robin, I think.
After all, she's only one little…
We're on our way to break into a house
Might be a bird But I sneak just like a mouse
translation.es: Seré una pajarita, pero me escabullo como ratoncita.

translation.en: - So, what are you getting tonight? - I might get a pie crumb?
- Something moldy, I think. - Well, I'm gonna sneak a whole crust.
translation.es: - Algo mohoso. - Me robaré toda la corteza.

translation.en: Well, I'm going to sneak a whole sandwich. Yes.
translation.es: Yo me robaré un sándwich entero. Sí.

translation.en: - You can't sneak a whole sandwich. - How do you sneak a sandwich?
That's in my eye! Don't do that.
translation.es: - ¡Lo tengo en el ojo! - No hagas eso.

translation.en: - Pip, you're up front. - Yes, Dad. - Dink, don't drag your tail. - Okay.
translation.es: Pip, vas primero. Dink, levanta la cola.

translation.en: - Flynn, Flin, no showing off. - All right.
The rules of the sneak are simple and thus Follow them close You could steal a crust
translation.es: Las reglas para escabullirte te permitirán robar.

translation.en: - Or a crumpet rind - Or a pinch of pie
Or the grease from the tip Of a soggy french fry
translation.es: Grasa de la punta de una papa frita.

translation.en: Crumbs and crusts and stale bread Soggy flakes and bin dregs
translation.es: Migas, costras y pan duro, cereales viejos y basura.

translation.en: Any old leftovers We'll sneak home with us
First find a secret entrance Keep your eyes open wide
translation.es: Primero abrimos los ojos para la entrada hallar.

translation.en: - For a hole - Or a crack
- Or a window with a gap - Just enough to squeeze inside
translation.es: - Ventana entreabierta. - Así voy a entrar.

translation.en: Once we're in, we creep around Tiptoe past without a sound Keep to the shadows Don't get heard
translation.es: Una vez adentro, somos sigilosos. Nos ocultamos bien callados.

translation.en: Last, the most important Remember in the who- man place
translation.es: Por último, recuerden que los jumanos

translation.en: So we must never leave a trace
translation.es: Así que no debemos dejar rastro.

translation.en: Crumbs and crusts and stale bread Soggy flakes and bin dregs
translation.es: Migas, costras y pan duro, cereales viejos y basura.

translation.en: Any old leftovers We'll sneak home with us
translation.es: Cualquier sobra vieja nos la llevaremos.

translation.en: When we're done, we disappear Nobody knows that we were here
translation.es: Al terminar, desaparecemos. Nadie sabe que vinimos.

translation.en: - With crumbs in our hands - And warmth in our hearts
translation.es: - Con migas. - Con calor en el corazón.

translation.en: And the sludge from the tin Of a moldy jam tart
translation.es: Y un trozo mohoso de pastel.

translation.en: Don't leave a trace Keep to the shadows Take what we need
translation.es: No dejen rastro. Tomamos los que queremos.

translation.en: The rules of the sneak are these
translation.es: Las reglas de escabullirse son así.

translation.en: Well, let's not go back there again.
They'll be setting out traps or maybe even getting a kitten.
translation.es: Pondrán trampas o quizá traigan un gatito.

translation.en: Well, the spoon, and the sandwich, and--
Come on. We've still got plenty to eat.
There's the bag of Earl Grey.
All right. Well, come on now. Off to bed.
translation.es: Muy bien. Vamos. A la cama.

translation.en: It's okay, Robin. We'll figure this out together.
Yeah. I mean, next time, I'll just…

translation.es: me mantendré lejos de las cucharas.

translation.en: Yeah. It was easy. Just got them from a who- man house.
translation.es: Sí. Fue fácil. Son de una casa de jumanos.

translation.en: Oh, wow, Robin! You're the most amazing sneak ever!
translation.es: ¡Vaya, Robin! ¡Eres la que mejor se escabulle!.

translation.en: Can't wait to see the look on Pip's face when I come back with a crumb the size of his head.
translation.es: Quiero ver la cara de Pip cuando vuelva con una miga gigante.

translation.en: - Do you know where the-- - No.
Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't realize this was a…
translation.es: Perdón. No sabía que esta era…

translation.en: - Well, I've got a broken wing! - Oh no. How did that happen?
translation.es: - Tengo un ala rota. - Ay, no. ¿Qué te pasó?

translation.en: - Let's get you safe indoors, hey? - Thanks. Is the cat still--
translation.es: - Estarás a salvo adentro. - Gracias. ¿El gato…?

translation.en: - Are we safe in here? - Yes. We're safe.
translation.es: - ¿Estamos a salvo aquí? - Sí. Así es.

translation.en: The thorns keep unwanted visitors out.
translation.es: Las espinas alejan a los intrusos.

translation.en: Why, thank you. I suppose it is rather…
translation.es: Gracias. Sí, creo que es muy…

translation.en: Bet they've got loads of crumbs in there.
And all because of that magic shiny wishing star, eh?
translation.es: Y todo gracias a esa brillante estrella mágica, ¿no?

translation.en: Okay. It must be here somewhere.
Once a year, the who- mans take the spikiest tree in the woods,
translation.es: Una vez al año, los jumanos toman el árbol más puntiagudo del bosque

translation.en: cover it in tin- soil and boo- bells,
translation.es: y lo cubren con escarcha y fesferas

translation.en: until their tree is all twinkling and beautiful.
translation.es: hasta que brilla y queda hermoso.

translation.en: Then, they put a shiny magic star on top, make a wish,
translation.es: Colocan encima una estrella mágica brillante, piden un deseo y en la mañana consiguen lo que quieren.

translation.en: and in the morning, they get anything they want.
translation.es: piden un deseo y en la mañana consiguen lo que quieren.

translation.en: Well, what could be better than crumbs?

translation.es: Las cosas no se irán volando.

translation.en: Things will stick with you till the end Oh yes, on things you can depend
translation.es: Las cosas te acompañarán hasta el final. En ellas puedes confiar.

translation.en: See my bathtub? It's designer Finest china! Well, kinda
translation.es: ¿Mi bañera? Es de diseñador. ¡La mejor vajilla! Mas o menos.

translation.en: Simply must have the latest bottle top I love it so, I'll never stop
translation.es: Amo las tapas de botella modernas. No las dejaré.

translation.en: This chair? Hedgehog hair Pamperclips? I've got the pair
This is a limited- edition piece of string
translation.es: Este es un hilo de edición limitada.

translation.en: I was a bird who couldn't fly Felt tiny while they flew up high
translation.es: Si fuera un pajarito que no puede volar con los demás,

translation.en: Surrounded myself with things so gorgeous
So afraid and alone Things turn a hovel to a home
translation.es: ¿Hay miedo y soledad? Las cosas hacen de esto un hogar.

translation.en: Got no personality? I let my lampshade speak for me
translation.es: ¿No tengo personalidad? La lámpara hablará por mí.

translation.en: Hollow inside? You're not enough? Just stuff that hole with lovely stuff
Things are things that make you happy Who needs friends? I've got a shoe chair
translation.es: Las cosas te hacen feliz. No necesitas amigos.

translation.en: No one there for you to care for? Polish up your silverware for?
translation.es: Prefiero la plata pulir que a otros visitar.

translation.en: There's no better company than one penny
translation.es: La mejor compañía es una moneda.

translation.en: Look, my point is, wish for something far better than crumbs.
translation.es: Digo que podrías pedir algo mejor que migas.

translation.en: - Do what? - I'll go get the star.
Impossible! It's inside the who- man house.
translation.es: ¡Imposible! Está en la casa de los jumanos.

translation.en: Maybe I forgot to mention? I was raised by mice. Explains the ears.
translation.es: - ¿Mencioné que me criaron ratones? - De ahí las orejas.

translation.en: And if there's one thing us mice are good at, it's sneaking.
translation.es: Y si algo hacemos bien los ratones es escabullirnos.

translation.en: To get stuff. Like, stealing it.
What are you doing? You're supposed to wait outside.
- I thought that we were-- - Who- mans!
We're going to have to be the sneakiest mice we've ever been.
translation.es: Debemos ser los ratones más sigilosos del mundo.

translation.en: Just do exactly what I do.
translation.es: Solo haz lo que yo hago.

translation.en: What are you doing? You'll wake the who- mans.
I'm being a sneaky mouse. That's not sneaking.
translation.es: - Soy como ratón sigiloso. - Eso no es sigiloso.

translation.en: The whole point of being a mouse is that you don't draw attention to yourself.
translation.es: La idea de ser un ratón es que no llamas la atención.

translation.en: Not bad for a couple of flightless fools, eh?
translation.es: Nada mal para unos tontos que no vuelan.

translation.en: Why is it you don't fly?
I just never learned. I mean, mice don't fly.
translation.es: Nunca aprendí. Los ratones no vuelan.

translation.en: Well, it's easy! You just flap!
it's the little bird who sneaks about on the floor like a…
translation.es: Es el pajarito se escabulle por el suelo

translation.en: And who are you trying to fool with those… funny things?
translation.es: ¿Y a quién intentas engañar con esas cosas graciosas?

translation.en: - My family are mice, so… - Mice?
You know you'll never be a real mouse.
translation.es: Nunca serás una ratona de verdad.

translation.en: Micey ears atop a birdy beak
translation.es: Orejas de ratón sobre un pico.

translation.en: But I've never seen a bird So peculiar, so absurd
translation.es: Nunca había visto un ave tan peculiar y absurda.

translation.en: How about we play a game Of hide- and- seek, if you can?
translation.es: ¿Y si jugamos a las escondidas, si puedes?

translation.en: As a mouse, to me You seem to be just terrible
Fitting in is more Than dress- up and pretend
translation.es: Encajar es más que disfrazarse y fingir.

translation.en: If it's fitting in you're desperate for Come down, search no more
translation.es: Si encajar es lo quieres, ven aquí y ya no busques.

translation.en: I know the perfect place For you, my friend
translation.es: Conozco el lugar perfecto para ti, amiga.

translation.en: For you, I've the perfect place
translation.es: Para ti tengo el lugar perfecto.

translation.en: Not picky, stick with me What's in a name?
translation.es: Quédate conmigo. ¿Qué importa lo que eres?

translation.en: After all, under the skin You're all the same
translation.es: Bajo la piel, todos son iguales.
Lo que cuenta es lo que hay adentro.

translation.en: Fitting in could be a breeze
Just a squash and a squeeze
translation.es: Solo un pisotón y un apretón.

translation.en: Brush out those ears Come along with me
translation.es: Quítate esas orejas y ven conmigo.

translation.en: Quick as a glug You could be sitting snug, perfectly
translation.es: De un sopetón muy cómodo vas a estar

translation.en: You don't fit in But you'd fit into my belly
translation.es: porque en mi panza vas a encajar.

translation.en: For you, I've the perfect place
translation.es: Para ti, tengo el lugar perfecto.

translation.en: For you, I've the perfect place
translation.es: Para ti, tengo el lugar perfecto.

translation.en: You really are a terrible mouse
We did it! Everlasting happiness awaits!
Told you us mice are good at sneaking.
translation.es: Te dije que los ratones sabemos escabullirnos.

translation.en: You know, I think we make very bad mice. Yes. Quite terrible.
translation.es: Creo que somos ratones muy malos. Sí. Somos terribles.

translation.en: But who cares? We got the star!
Well, I hope you thought of something better to wish for than a soggy old sandwich.
translation.es: Ojalá tengas algo mejor que pedir que un sándwich húmedo.

translation.en: You know, like a hubcap. Or a shiny fork. Or a pincil sharpener.
translation.es: Como un tapón, un tenedor brillante o un afilapuntas.

translation.en: Or a thimble. Or how about a safety pin…
translation.es: O un dedal. ¿O qué tal un imperdible?

translation.en: Well, I wish I wasn't a bird.
translation.es: Bueno, desearía no ser un pájaro.

translation.en: I wish I was a mouse.
Come now. It was always a bit of a long shot, eh?
translation.es: Vamos. Sabíamos que era muy difícil.

translation.en: We've been looking everywhere for you!
I went to sneak us some crumbs, but… it all went wrong.
translation.es: Me escabullí a buscar unas migas, pero todo salió mal.

translation.en: I think I'm a… terrible mouse.
translation.es: creo que soy un ratón terrible.

translation.en: I couldn't have said it better myself.
Don't worry. There's no way she could fit through the…
translation.es: Tranquilos. No puede pasar por la…

translation.en: The rules of the sneak are these
translation.es: Las reglas de escabullirse son así.

translation.en: That was the most un- sneaky…

translation.es: - Y más tonto. - Y más genial.

translation.en: Birdy- mousy thing we've ever seen!
But, of course, you're a mouse.
- Sorry, is that confusing? - Yeah, what? She's a bird.
translation.es: - ¿Eso es confuso? - Sí. Es un ave.

translation.en: Exactly. She is a bird, and that's wonderful.
translation.es: Exacto. Es un ave, y eso es maravilloso.

translation.en: And what I mean is, we're the mouse family. All of us.
translation.es: Y lo que quiero decir es que todos somos la familia de los ratones.

translation.en: - Is the cat one of the family? - No, Dink. The cat tried to eat us.
translation.es: - ¿La gata también? - No. Ella quiso comernos.

translation.en: - Because she loves us? - No. Because she's a predator.
translation.es: - ¿Porque nos ama? - No. Porque es una depredadora.

translation.en: - So, you fly now? - Well, yeah. I guess so.
translation.es: - ¿Ahora vuelas? - Bueno, sí. Supongo que sí.

translation.en: But we're all still hungry, and you've ruined Magpie's house.
translation.es: Aún tenemos hambre y arruinaste la casa de Urraca.

translation.en: Yeah, and I'm bad at sneaking.
If anything, I just draw attention to myself.
translation.es: No dejo de llamar la atención.

translation.en: Hey! Over here! A song for your ear
translation.es: ¡Oye! ¡Por aquí! Una canción que puedes oír.

translation.en: While we keep to the shadows
Don't get heard Whisper every single word
translation.es: Que no nos oigan. Debemos susurrar.

translation.en: Look at me fly Catching your eye
translation.es: Mira cómo vuelo. Te llamo la atención.

translation.en: - With crumbs in our arms - And a raisin or two
translation.es: - Con migas. - Una o dos pasas.

translation.en: And a coin from the middle Of this sticky brown poo
translation.es: Y la moneda que hay dentro del pastel.

translation.en: Look at me And you won't see my sneaky family
translation.es: Mírenme y no verán que mi familia se escabulle.

translation.en: - Don't make a sound - Do make a sound
- Don't leave a trace - Do leave a trace
- Keep to the shadows - And to the light
translation.es: - En las sombras. - Y la luz.

translation.en: - Take what we need - This is more than we need.
The rules of the sneak are these
translation.es: Las reglas de escabullirse son así.
